item.title: Auto cache dl
item.dc:creator: @blik blik
item.description:
@blik wrote:

ok my auto cache dl works BUT it downloads to the wrong place. it doesnt dl to the c: drive it downloads to my “user” folder anyone knows a quick fix

public static String getCacheDir() {
return System.getProperty(“user.home”) + “/.rspsCache2”; //only change this if you edit cache
}
public static final String cacheLink = “http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?b8vv0bm1lhjn860”; //make sure it zip
public static final int cacheRevision = 3; //change this if you edit cache

Read full topic
